definition: to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The cost of non-compliance with industry regulations can be catastrophic.
sentences.chinese: 對於不符合工業規則的代價可能是毀滅性的。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Pseudomonas solanacarum (Smith) Smith.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一種由青枯假單胞菌引起的生薑毀滅性病害。

sentences.english: Unprincipled concessions in diplomacy led to a crushing failure in real politics.
sentences.chinese: 外交上無原則的讓步導致政治上一場毀滅性的失敗。

sentences.english: Destructively make room garbage to the cosmos.
sentences.chinese: 對宇宙毀滅性的製造空間垃圾。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Ralstonia solanacearum.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一種由青枯勞爾氏菌引起的生薑毀滅性病害。

sentences.english: When he heard about the devastating earthquake in Haiti, he was at the Australian Open.
sentences.chinese: 海地毀滅性地震傳到他的耳裏，他還在澳網中搏殺。

sentences.english: Root-rot is a destructive disease in the tung-oil tree (Aleurites fordii Hemsl. )
sentences.chinese: 油桐根腐病是油桐林的一種毀滅性病害。

sentences.english: If your habits are self-destructive, you will fail in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的習慣是自我毀滅性的，你將來必定失敗。

sentences.english: Dollar-cost averaging guards against these damaging animal spirits.
sentences.chinese: 平均成本法可以防範這些毀滅性的非理性行爲。

sentences.english: The object is to inflict out-and-out damage on your adversary.
sentences.chinese: 其目的是給對手以徹底的毀滅性打擊。
尼萊吉哈奇有一個毀滅性的經理人。

sentences.english: The effects of the extreme poverties of these countries is devastating. Just a few
sentences.chinese: 極端的貧困對這些國家產生了毀滅性的影響。

sentences.english: Whether he will actually embark on this potentially suicidal plan is also unclear.
sentences.chinese: 他是否將從事這項毀滅性的計劃仍是個未知。

sentences.english: The firestorm created by the Chicxulub impact and the subsequent pollution were devastating.
sentences.chinese: 奇虛樂撞擊帶來的火災與接下來的污染是毀滅性的。

sentences.english: Desserts are the diet downfall of the holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 甜食是假日期間的極具毀滅性的飲食。

sentences.english: Thousands dead or missing from the devastating earthquake and tsunami surge.
sentences.chinese: 數千人因毀滅性的地震及海嘯巨浪喪生或是失蹤。

definition: to break up into components/to disintegrate/to collapse/to crumble
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
to inflict heavy losses/to inflict serious damage
stumbling block/obstacle/someone who gets in your way
